args.content:
Packing List for Hawaii Trip:

1. Clothing:
- Lightweight and breathable clothing (t-shirts, tank tops, shorts, dresses)
- Comfortable walking shoes/sneakers
- Sandals/flip flops with a good grip
- Socks and undergarments
- Swimwear (swimsuits, rash guards, board shorts)
- Light jacket or sweater for cooler evenings
- Rain gear (umbrella, raincoat)
- Warm layers for high-altitude areas

2. Toiletries:
- Toothbrush and toothpaste
- Deodorant
- Shampoo and conditioner
- Soap
- Razor and shaving cream (if applicable)
- Makeup and makeup remover (if applicable)
- Hairbrush/comb
- Contact lenses and solution (if applicable)
- Prescription medication and any necessary documentation
